articles.title: Mark-Paul Gosselaar says this cringeworthy 'Saved by the Bell' episode 'would never get made' now - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mark-Paul Gosselaar is reflecting on a racially insensitive "Saved by the Bell" episode where Zack Morris mocked Native Americans.
articles.content:
Mark-Paul Gosselaar is reflecting on a racially insensitive "Saved by the Bell" episode that "would never get made" now.

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Netflix releases first trailer for Yasuke, the new anime from MAPPA - Polygon
articles.description: Netflix’s upcoming anime Yasuke tells the story of an African samurai in an alternate-world version of feudal Japan with magic and mechs. The series will be animated by MAPPA, the studio behind Attack on Titan Final Season, and stars LaKeith Stanfield.
articles.content: Feudal Japan has a lot more magic than youd expect
